message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'm willing to give you 40% of the money.
I'm starting with a bold move, Alice. Take it or leave it!
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob. Let's split the money 50/50.
You're getting desperate, Alice. Take this or you'll get nothing!
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. I'll give you a decent amount, but I need to keep most of the money for myself.
You're getting low on options, Alice. This is my last good offer!
I'm making a strong counteroffer, Bob. I'll give you a small amount, but I'm keeping most of the money.
It's now or never, Alice. Take the whole thing or walk away!
I'm making a final stand, Bob. I'll give you a tiny amount, but I'm keeping most of the money. This is my last offer.
Fine, you want to play it that way? I'll give you the whole thing. Congratulations, you win!
